title.rendered: “Decisive IDF Strikes: Averting Terror in Jenin with Precision Eliminations and Arrests Across Judea and Samaria”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The elimination of armed terrorists from the air and by snipers in Jenin: An aircraft eliminated two armed terrorists, another terrorist was killed by sniper fire, engineering forces destroyed a vehicle in which explosives were found.

IDF soldiers, Shin Bet and MAGAV operated tonight to arrest ten wanted men across Judea and Samaria.

In a brigade operation to thwart terror in Jenin, under the Menashe Brigade, an aircraft eliminated two armed terrorists from the air. Engineering forces destroyed a vehicle in which ready-to-use explosives were found, and arrested two suspects who were in the vehicle prior to its destruction.

During the activity in Jenin, the forces eliminated a terrorist who threw explosives at the force and injured additional terrorists. Simultaneously, engineering tools uncovered explosives buried under axles, another wanted man was arrested, and war means were confiscated.

While operating in Karawat Bani Hassan in the Ephraim brigade, the forces arrested a wanted person and confiscated warfare means.

The arrested wanted persons and the confiscated warfare means have been transferred for further handling by security forces, no casualties to our forces.

So far, since the beginning of the war, about 3,600 wanted men have been arrested throughout the Judea and Samaria Division and in the Jordan Valley and Valleys Brigade, about 1,600 of them are affiliated with the Hamas terrorist organization.

Attached is documentation of the forces’ activity: https://bit.ly/4czhzjP

Attached are pictures from the forces’ activity: https://idfanc.activetrail.biz/ANC27032024HFDG
